■When the order appears on the
KVS, put the buns in the toaster
and steamer. Then prepare the
correct wrapper and box.

■Wrap the toasted buns, put
them in the box and hand it
to the assembler. Then, bump
the KVS display to clear it.

■If you are the initiator,
continue assembling and don't
toast the next bun until the
first one reaches the HLZ.

■One person can assemble up
to two items at once.
■The initiator toasts while
observing the state of the
assembly line.
